title: France panorama. [No. 68/28]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. A new assembly - France has gone to the polls to elect her new national Assembly. 2. Polar missions - high and low altitude parachuting to supply the French Polar bases in Greenland. 3. The Grand Prix de Paris - the Grand Prix at Longchamps race-course. 4. The Arts - new rooms in Paris’ Carnavalet Museum, devoted to 18th century French furniture.
